title: Stade Banfora
text: Stade Banfora is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Banfora">Banfora</a>, <a href="Burkina%20Faso">Burkina Faso</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="Union%20Sportive%20de%20la%20Como%C3%A9">Union Sportive de la Comoé</a>. The stadium holds 6,000 people.
